alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tyngsborough, or near Chelmsford, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Westford, Newburyport, Amesbury, Ipswich, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Townsend, Littleton and Salisbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
